verbose_text: To investigate the origin of multinucleation in OIS, we generated primary human fibroblasts (IMR90) expressing tamoxifen-activatable oncogenic H-RasV12 fused to the estrogen receptor (ER) ligand binding domain (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY A), hereinafter referred to as ERRAS cells.
